Uses of Package
com.nxp.id.jcopx

Classes in com.nxp.id.jcopx used by com.nxp.id.jcopx
BACAccelerator
          Deprecated. Interface covered now by the SACAccelerator class using the protocol type SM_3DES_CBC_CBC.
BACAcceleratorException
          Exception class used by the BACAccelerator for BAC compliant secure messaging.
ECPoint
          The interface ECPoint defines and provides methods that can be used to generate Java Card objects that implement JCOP specific EC algorithms.
IOConfigException
          Exception class used by IOConfigX class.
IOControlException
          Exception class used by IOControlX class.
JCOPXException
          Generic exception class that is used by features out of NXPs JCOPX package to indicate invalid usage.
SACAccelerator
          SACAccelerator may be used by an applet wishing to delegate the handling of entity authentication and APDU security to its associated Security Domain.
SecureBoxException
          Exception class that is used by SecureBox implementation to indicate invalid usage.
